text:
e="preserve">Nabil Bechaouch (1970 – 7 October 2020) was a Tunisian footballer. He was born in Aryanah, Tunisia. Bechaouch played for the national team from 1993 to 1995. He played from Olympique Béja, CS Sfaxien and Stade Tunisien.
Bechaouch died on 7 October 2020 of a heart attack in Béja, Tunisia.
